description: This file defines a React component 'AuthPage' that manages user authentication UI, handling sign-in, sign-up, session checking, and logout functionalities, utilizing imported API functions.

methods.name: AuthPage
methods.description: React functional component for user authentication page including sign-in, sign-up, session check, and logout logic.

methods.name: handleAuth
methods.description: Handles user authentication process, managing sign-in and sign-up based on current mode, updating user profile state, and handling errors.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Logs out the user and clears the user profile state.
